events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this product does not meet my needs.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to the customer's dissatisfaction with the incorrect item delivered.
Assignment of support agent Maria to handle the refund request for the customer has been completed.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order issue. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue and proceed?
Sure, my order number is 738291 and I have attached a photo showing the item does not match the product I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method and provide you with a prepaid return shipping label.
That sounds great, I appreciate your quick response and support with resolving this refund.
The refund has been processed, and you will receive confirmation via email shortly. We also sent you the return label for the incorrect item.
Just following up to ensure that you received the refund and if there’s anything else we can assist you with, please let us know.
Yes, I got the refund in my account yesterday. Thanks for the excellent customer service and prompt handling.
We are happy your issue is resolved. We consider this case closed but please contact us anytime in the future for assistance.
